snippet.title: Affinity Sorrow Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Affinity Sorrow, a brand new RPG for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive

Check us out on Kickstarter (launches 1/25/2022): https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/seconddimension/affinity-sorrow-a-true-16-bit-turn-based-rpg-adventure

Audio By: Johnny Retro/Retro Raider: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7mQerhKnRITfjSg_v8D_rA
Artwork By: Jav Leal: https://twitter.com/Pixel_Javi
Voice By: James Colozzi
Produced By: Second Dimension

Visit our website: https://www.second-dimension.com/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/alteredimension
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/seconddimensionllc
